channel.title: Passwords on TrozWare
channel.description: Recent content in Passwords on TrozWare

item.title: Dice Pass Updated
item.description: Dice Pass 1.1 is now available from the Mac App Store. What does Dice Pass do? Dice Pass is a utility to app to generate random passphrases based on the Diceware system. Diceware uses a table of pre-defined words, each assigned a 5 digit code number containing the digits 1 to 6. The official way to generate a phrase is to roll 5 dice for each word you want in your passphrase and then consult the words table to find the matching word.
